## gatherToDOM variable

Gather up all the toDOM methods from the provided spec object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gatherToDOM: <GSpec extends NodeExtensionSpec | MarkExtensionSpec>(specs: Record<string, GSpec>) => Record<string, GSpec["toDOM"]>
```
